about_the_game:
Welcome to a thrilling Greek God themed deckbuilding RPG! Prepare to put your strategy skills to the test in this turn-based game of mythic proportions. Collect and customize your deck with cards featuring legendary gods and creatures, each with their unique abilities and strengths. Explore ancient ruins, defeat fearsome monsters and face off against rival deities in epic battles of divine power. Plan your moves carefully, and create devastating combos to crush your opponents. With an ever-expanding array of cards and godly powers to discover, the possibilities are endless. Will you rise to the top and claim your place among the gods?

  • Collect and customize your deck of cards featuring legendary gods and mythical creatures, each with unique abilities and strengths. Acquire new cards as you progress through the game, and choose the ones that suit your playstyle the best.
  • Plan your moves carefully and take your turn in epic battles of divine power. Outmaneuver your opponents and create devastating combos to emerge victorious.
  • Immerse yourself in the world of ancient Greece, and face off against rival deities in epic clashes of godly power. Explore ancient ruins, defeat fearsome monsters, and uncover the secrets of the gods.
  • Use your deck of cards to plan your moves and outmaneuver your opponents. With a wide variety of cards and powers at your disposal, the possibilities are endless.
  • As you play, you'll earn rewards and gain experience, unlocking new cards and powers to add to your deck. Customize your deck to suit your playstyle, and become the ultimate god of the pantheon.

name: Heroes of Olympus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Headphones Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-10105f /AMD RYZEN 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Headphones Recommended

short_description: In this Greek God-themed deckbuilder, you'll collect powerful cards featuring legendary gods to create the ultimate deck. With a vast array of cards to discover and powerful gods to harness, the only limit is your imagination. Do you have what it takes to rise up and become a god among gods?
